sentences.sContent: Two heart attacks in a year. It hasn’t stopped him smoking, though.
sentences.sCn: 一年里心脏病发作了两次，可是那也没让他把烟戒掉。

sentences.sContent: It sounds like a lot of fun. Isn’t it rather risky though?
sentences.sCn: 听上去很有趣。可是这不是也很危险吗？

phrases.pCn: 走过；排练；经历；从头到尾地阅读

trans.tranOther: used after adding a fact, opinion, or question which seems surprising after what you have just said, or which makes what you have just said seem less true
used to introduce a statement that makes the main statement coming after it seem surprising, unlikely, or unexpected
